Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.numerical.matrix

Class LDLTDecomposition

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.numerical.matrix.LDLTDecomposition
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatrixSolver
public final class LDLTDecomposition extends Object implements MatrixSolver
A java version of the LAPACK 3.0 Bunch-Kaufman Symmetric Indefinite solver. This object contains routines solve(...) that finds the solution of an input matrix (assumed to be symmetric indefinite) for a series of RHS vectors. Two forms of the solver exist such that the matrix and solution vectors may be chosen to be preserved or not. If the matrix was not solvable a flag is set indicating such (isSolvable() is false). Copyright (c) 1992-2008 The University of Tennessee. All rights reserved.

    • solve

      public final void solve​(int n, double[] m, int nrhs, double[] b)
      Solves the system m x = b where m is an n x n symmetric indefinite lower triangular matrix and b is a set of nrhs RHS solution vectors of size n . The matrix m must contain at least n * (n + 1) / 2 elements and b must have at least n * nrhs elements. Extra elements are ignored. On exit the matrix is overwritten with the bunch-kaufman LDLT decomposition and b is overwritten with x. This function calls the LAPACK 3.0 dspsv routine.
      Parameters:
      n - - The size of the square symmetric indefinite lower triangular matrix m.
      m - - The n x n symmetric indefinitie lower triangular matrix in packed form (a[0][0], a[1][0], a[1][0], ..., a[n-1][0], a[1][1], a[1][2], ..., a[n-1][n-1]). On output m is overwritten by the bunch-kaufman LDLT decomposition.
      nrhs - - The number of RHS vectors to be solved for.
      b - - The RHS solution vectors. On output b is overwritten with the solution x.
